document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the Neotropical caddisfly genus Banyallarga (Trichoptera: Calamoceratidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Neotropical caddisfly genus Banyallarga (Trichoptera: Calamoceratidae)

mods:name.mods:namePart: Prather Table Of Contents, Aysha L.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phylloicus loxanus Navás 1934a:173
[ Type locality: Ecuador , Loja ; MNHNP; original description implies male, but type is female].

subSubSection.paragraph:
This is the largest known species of
Banyallarga
, and size alone is sufficient to distinguish this from other species in the genus. The shape of male tergum X is diagnostic for
B. loxana
, with its narrow, notched apex ( Fig. 6A, B ).
